name: Brad And Gary
description:
Brad and Gary was best friends. 
One day they went on a field trip to the sauce factory
Gary slipped on a stain of sauce and fell into a container of gravy.
Gary transformed into Gravy Guy and he swore to revenge the world.
Staring of with hishome town; 
Gravy Guy put a spell and transformed it into Sauce City and turned the citizens into sauce products. 

The years passed and Gravy Guy's power grew stronger.
But so did Brad's beard. 
Brad went out to Sauce City to put an end to this madness. 

Made for FZ's Game Jam in november 2022
